name: TEOMWEXER AI - Video-Generator
description: A next-generation AI-powered video generation and editing platform named 'TEOMWEXER AI'. This tool combines text-to-video generation, cinematic storytelling, and intelligent editing using Google Veo and Gemini models. It supports both image and video inputs, real-time prompt enhancement via a chatbot, and AI-assisted creative tools within a sleek, futuristic UI.
